```{r}
print( "harshit" )
```


```{r}
print( "harshit",27 ) #this will not work. we need one object only

```


```{r}
print( 27.7654321, digits = 8 ) we need one object only

```


```{r}
print( 27.7654321,digits = 5 ) 

```


```{r}

#concatenating data from 2 or objects by pasting them next to each other

name<-"Harshit"
lastName<-"Shukla"

paste(name,lastName) #PASTE WILL NOT INTERPRET WHAT \t DOES
```


```{r}
cat(name,lastName) #concatenate with no markings, numbers or quotes

```


```{r}
```


```{r}
cat(name,lastName,sep="------") #concatenate with no markings, numbers or quotes

```
